title: Living tomorrow. No. 103
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Lord Snowdon’s invention to improve wheelchairs look and mobility; motorised wheels used in tractors, lumber trucks, motorway mowers and fork lifts; radiation isotopes in medicine start of MRI equipment.
